ComicInfo.Summary:
Things are going just great at the newly reopened Bodega Bay Inn! Okay, so maybe a guest or two have gone missing, but how about that view? And people are reporting things moving in the shadows, but they’re also enjoying the continental breakfast! No… those noises downstairs definitely DO NOT sound like Puppets fighting Luchadores. That would just be crazy…
Variant and variant sketch covers limited to 1,500 copies each.
